entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
